title: "Its just a norm" does not excuse feeding a verbally harassing teammates.
body:
Title. At this point, I'm starting to just consider playing ranked or ARAM soley instead of normals. Over the past 3 days of playing norms, I have reported 7 players and gotten back 5 tickets saying I banned people, and it's not just norms it's ranked too. 

Preseason: "Oh I don't need to try in ranked, its preseason and the ladder will be reset."
In regular season: "Oh I don't need to try in ranked, I already got my dream rank and hit my point"
During placements: "Oh I don't need to try, I know ill get a good rank no matter what"
During anything: "Oh I don't need to try, its just a game LOL"

These are all things I have come across in the past years that have either been verbatim or very close to/sent a similar message. Stop giving players excuses to not try and win the game, having fun **IS ALLOWED** it's why we all play, but if your version of fun is trolling and harassing others, then you need to reevaluate your priorities, because there are 9 other players who want to try and win and practice to the best of their ability.

replies.body: You were the biggest feeder or one of the bigger feeders in most of your recent losses.  Not sure what you're complaining about.

How is that even remotely relevant? Sure I did badly in some games, but I never made excuses or bitched at my team for ksing or doing anything, because I realized I did bad. Nobody else seems to want to do that, also you left out the recent game where I went 16-0-2. Also, you wanna talk about feeding, how about that 1-7 game on your 1 trick?

> [{quoted}](name=Quáx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yk9smRw9,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-12-04T17:21:13.071+0000)
>
> How is that even remotely relevant? Sure I did badly in some games, but I never made excuses or bitched at my team for ksing or doing anything, because I realized I did bad. Nobody else seems to want to do that, also you left out the recent game where I went 16-0-2. Also, you wanna talk about feeding, how about that 1-7 game on your 1 trick?

My point is that you're whining about people doing poorly.  Yes, they're making excuses.  It's a defense mechanism.  None of your losses even have just a single player doing poorly.  Your whole team has done poorly in those losses, including you.

Harassing teammates is already against the rules, and as you've pointed out, leads to penalties.

Intentionally feeding is already against the rules, and leads to penalties.

But none of your games show anyone intentionally feeding.  They're just players doing poorly and trying to shrug it off.  You "did bad" in about 50% of your games. My point is that if everyone "did bad" at the rate that you "did bad" you'd have 2 people you consider feeders  on your team every single game.

People know that they're doing badly.  They don't need you pointing it out, or telling them to "try".

As for my 1/7 game, yes I did poorly.  It was my second game ever playing in the new jungle, and I attempted an early gank that went poorly and caused on early death, which is extremely punishing now.  It was also my first time seeing Senna in play, so I didn't have a good handle on the interaction with her (and apparently neither did my botlane).  But I didn't do poorly enough to be the sole cause of the loss.  There were TWO players on my team with DOUBLE my deaths.  

But here's the difference between you and me.  I didn't come here to complain post about teammates doing poorly.

Again. I am not complaining, I'm simply saying that if you did bad, own up to it and don't make excuses. How is that complaining lol? Any time I do bad I say mb, or sry I threw this game for us.


SO you're right, there is a difference. 

I own up and say "IM SORRY" whereas you...


IT WAS MY SECOND GAME IN PRESEASON, I ATTEMPTED EARLY GANK AND FAILED IT. I ALSO DIDNT KNOW HOW A CHAMPION WORKS BECAUSE IDK.

> [{quoted}](name=Quáx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=yk9smRw9,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-04T18:04:38.148+0000)

> IT WAS MY SECOND GAME IN PRESEASON, I ATTEMPTED EARLY GANK AND FAILED IT. I ALSO DIDNT KNOW HOW A CHAMPION WORKS BECAUSE IDK.

Dude, this whole thread is you complaining!

And by the way people don't make excuses unless there's a cause for them to make excuses.  Someone doesn't say "chill it's just preseason" unless the statement was a response to "stop sucking".  That you keep having this conversation with people in game says more about you than it does about them.  You don't need to tell people they're doing poorly.  When someone does poorly, they know it.  

Also, the very first thing I said about my bad game was "As for my 1/7 game, yes I did poorly." So, I don't know where you're going with that.
Subdue is 100% on point, bro! Please take some time and reconsider with a different perspective.
'Its just preseason' is now being used in ranked games too for this kind of behaviour
You can mute chat its not that hard
But all these players just had a bad game at the given moment ;)
